description: Returns a summary count of compliant and non-compliant resources for a compliance type. For example, this call can return State Manager associations, patches, or custom compliance types according to the filter criteria that you specify.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: One or more compliance or inventory filters. Use a filter to return a more specific list of results. (dict) --- One or more filters. Key (string) --- The name of the filter. Values (list) --- The value for which to search. (string) --- Type (string) --- The type of comparison that should be performed for the value: Equal, NotEqual, BeginWith, LessThan, or GreaterThan.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The value for which to search.

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: The type of comparison that should be performed for the value: Equal, NotEqual, BeginWith, LessThan, or GreaterThan.

nested_items.name: ComplianceSummaryItems
nested_items.description: A list of compliant and non-compliant summary counts based on compliance types. For example, this call returns State Manager associations, patches, or custom compliance types according to the filter criteria that you specified.

nested_items.name: ComplianceType
nested_items.description: The type of compliance item. For example, the compliance type can be Association, Patch, or Custom:string.

nested_items.name: CompliantSummary
nested_items.description: A list of COMPLIANT items for the specified compliance type.

nested_items.name: CompliantCount
nested_items.description: The total number of resources that are compliant.

nested_items.name: SeveritySummary
nested_items.description: A summary of the compliance severity by compliance type.

nested_items.name: CriticalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of resources or compliance items that have a severity level of Critical. Critical severity is determined by the organization that published the compliance items.

nested_items.name: HighCount
nested_items.description: The total number of resources or compliance items that have a severity level of high. High severity is determined by the organization that published the compliance items.

nested_items.name: MediumCount
nested_items.description: The total number of resources or compliance items that have a severity level of medium. Medium severity is determined by the organization that published the compliance items.

nested_items.name: LowCount
nested_items.description: The total number of resources or compliance items that have a severity level of low. Low severity is determined by the organization that published the compliance items.

nested_items.name: InformationalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of resources or compliance items that have a severity level of informational. Informational severity is determined by the organization that published the compliance items.

nested_items.name: UnspecifiedCount
nested_items.description: The total number of resources or compliance items that have a severity level of unspecified. Unspecified severity is determined by the organization that published the compliance items.

nested_items.name: NonCompliantSummary
nested_items.description: A list of NON_COMPLIANT items for the specified compliance type.

nested_items.name: NonCompliantCount
nested_items.description: The total number of compliance items that aren't compliant.

nested_items.name: SeveritySummary
nested_items.description: A summary of the non-compliance severity by compliance type.

nested_items.name: CriticalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of resources or compliance items that have a severity level of Critical. Critical severity is determined by the organization that published the compliance items.

nested_items.name: HighCount
nested_items.description: The total number of resources or compliance items that have a severity level of high. High severity is determined by the organization that published the compliance items.

nested_items.name: MediumCount
nested_items.description: The total number of resources or compliance items that have a severity level of medium. Medium severity is determined by the organization that published the compliance items.

nested_items.name: LowCount
nested_items.description: The total number of resources or compliance items that have a severity level of low. Low severity is determined by the organization that published the compliance items.

nested_items.name: InformationalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of resources or compliance items that have a severity level of informational. Informational severity is determined by the organization that published the compliance items.

nested_items.name: UnspecifiedCount
nested_items.description: The total number of resources or compliance items that have a severity level of unspecified. Unspecified severity is determined by the organization that published the compliance items.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of items to return. Use this token to get the next set of results.
